name: BREEZE OF CHEEZE
description:
As a scientist who took the fight against world hunger on a new level, you have the mission to feed the world with delicious moon cheese.

With new experimental controls, you have to navigate, load and fire your cheese canon against global hunger and corrupt food corporations.

I'm very thankful for every critique!

btw this is my first GameJam and second game, I ever finished. I started to learn coding and gamedev this year. If you have time to look at my code and tell me how to improve (books, videos, courses,..) I would be very very thankful!

Cheers and enjoy the game! :)

Dom

Theme Interpretation ingame:
Moonshot: Shooting moon-cheese to earth.
Moonshot thinking: Find a solution to worldhunger.
GitHUB: https://github.com/Domain314/BreezeOfCheezeRep
